评论概述: Looks nice but once the battery dies you throw it in the trash
评论详情: This is not a watch on which you can change the battery yourself and sending it out for battery change is expensive. Shortly, it's a single-use watch. Bad for the environment and for the wallet.  I received this watch for my birthday close to two years ago. It looks beautiful but when it came to changing the battery, it takes a special kit to open it, so the manufacturer said it needs to be shipped somewhere for battery change (it would have costed me the same price as to buy a new one). I bought a new battery and the kit to do it myself but, sadly, it never worked after that.  I regret getting this one.

评论概述: A decent watch that needs better quality control
评论详情: The watch is aesthetically pleasing to me and the wrist bands are of just decent quality, I really want to detail the issues with this specific Fizili watch. The minute hand is loose. When I received the watch the crown was not locked in (pressed in), the minute hand moved excessively which caused concern. Pressing in the crown the minute hand still moves but only about half a minute forward or backwards. Setting the time is not easy since the minute hand will jump backwards when you attempt to press in the crown, I have figured out how to set the clock as accurately as possible with this issue. The seconds dial does not accurately match the minute hand movement, it is either a few seconds ahead or behind to exactly match the minute hand. After nearly three months of owning the watch it is usually half a minute ahead. I own several wrist watches, one that is much cheaper then this Fizili watch and it doesn't have any issues. Due to the hassle of returning the watch, I decided to keep it. The Fizili watch does almost work exactly with quite a few issues on the side. I personally, would not recommend this watch.

评论概述: Looks good...but a very cheap movement inside
评论详情: I knew based on the price this wasn't going to be a well made watch, but I liked how it looked and purchased it for a specific purpose.  I like the size as my wrist is medium sized (7.25") and it's thin.  The color is nice and I like the 'monochrome' look with the hands being just a bit darker than the face. The band is good but won't breath well in hot weather (but I wasn't expecting that).  The movement inside however...probably cost $1. If you like some modicum of precision in setting the time, look elsewhere.  To be fair, I may have received a bad one, but I spent 10 minutes hoping to get lucky by setting the time with the small seconds at 12 and the minute hand lined up on one of the markers around the dial.  No success...not even close!  It consistently jumps backward about '30 seconds'.  However, I did notice that if the seconds hand was at '30' it would set perfectly....except for being 30 seconds ahead or behind. Ha Ha!All that nitpicking aside (I am laughing at myself about giving a cheap watch this much of a review), if you don't care about that, this could be a nice piece to wear that is very inexpensive and looks decent.
Dials and hands are not light blue, much darker

Purchased because I like monochrome watches. Photos make it look like all the elements are closely matching colors, but they are not. Definitely NOT the monochrome red shown in the product photos.
